message_1: What is the balanced redox reaction for the combustion of methane (CH4) in the presence of oxygen (O2) to form carbon dioxide (CO2) and water (H2O)?
message_2:
The balanced redox reaction for the combustion of methane (CH4) in the presence of oxygen (O2) to form carbon dioxide (CO2) and water (H2O) is as follows:

CH4 + 2 O2 â†’ CO2 + 2 H2O
